title.narrative: PFM Multi Donor Trust Fund Phase II

description.narrative: The Public Financial Management Multi Donor Trust Fund (PFM MDTF) Phase II aims to strengthen the performance, transparency and accountability in public financial management in Nepal. In five years, the Nepal PFM MDTF envisions a country where solid foundation for credible and performing PFM systems at central, regional and local levels support economic development and service delivery of citizens.
